When [this plane](http://imgur.com/a/2C4Mu) reaches about 100-150 m/s, it starts yawing to the left or right for no apparent reason. The plane is all stock parts placed using mirror symmetry and doesn't have any weird control surface alignment that I know of. The only non-symmetrical thing is the ladder!
